snippet: 1000Memories, a company that lets people create online memories for the dead, announced a partnership Tuesday with WePay, a payment provider. The deal will give users a free account and the option of raising money for projects, foundations or char...
abstract: 1000Memories, a company that lets people create online memories for the dead, announced a partnership Tuesday with WePay, a payment provider. The deal will give users a free account and the option of raising money for projects, foundations or charities, according to its blog.
